title: 2020 NDC Tracker
summary: Countries' intention to update or enhance their 2020 NDCs
description: The 2020 NDC Tracker keeps track of which countries have signaled they will update or enhance their 2020 national climate commitments (NDCs).
cautions: Some nations have signaled that the impacts of the coronavirus pandemic may delay their submission of updated or enhanced NDCs. While many will submit in 2020 as scheduled, some have indicated they may do so in 2021 ahead of COP26. The information below does not reflect these possible delays.
citation: Climate Watch 2020 NDC Tracker. 2021. Washington, DC: World Resources Institute. Available online at: https://www.climatewatchdata.org/2020-ndc-tracker
